name: Wild Card
description:
CONTROLS:

W A S D                             - Movement

Mouse                                - Aim

Left Mouse Button    - Shoot

Right Mouse Button - Melee

Spacebar                          - Dash / Dodge Roll

R                                            - Restart

--------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was created (art + gameplay) and submitted by:

  • @iamg123
  • @IanSniffen
  • @b_lit26
  • @EvanMastriano

for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam. This game was created over a 48hr period between 7/10/2020 3pm EST and 7/12/2020 3pm EST.

Music and various audio bytes by:

@DanSquicciarino
